Package view

Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
view.ViewController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientOffersListViewController, ClientOfferViewController, ClientRentingListViewController, ClientRentingViewController, ClientUserViewController, HomePageViewController, LoginViewController, MessageViewController, PublishOfferViewController, SendMessageViewController, SignUpViewController
public abstract class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class for the controllers used for the common parts of them.

  • Method Details

    • init

      protected abstract void init()
      Abstract method to initialise the controller.

    • init

      public void init​(ViewHandler viewHandler, ViewModelFactory viewModelFactory, javafx.scene.layout.Region root)
      Three-argument constructor that initialises the controller. The method init() is also called.
      Parameters:
      viewHandler - The Object to handle views and their environments.
      viewModelFactory - The Object to obtain the ViewModel objects.
      root - The Object needed to be set for the environment of the controller.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Method executed everytime the view and the controller are set.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.layout.Region getRoot()
      Getter for the Root object.
      Returns:
      The Root object of the controller.

    • getViewHandler

      public ViewHandler getViewHandler()
      Getter for the ViewHandler object.
      Returns:
      The ViewHandler object of the controller.

    • getViewModelFactory

      public ViewModelFactory getViewModelFactory()
      Getter for the ViewModelFactory object.
      Returns:
      The ViewModelFactory object of the controller.
